clue_002a.description: The whispers follow a mathematical pattern: Fibonacci intervals between messages.
clue_002a.notes: Next whisper should occur at tick 89.

clue_002b.description: [HIDDEN] Arena training AI contains a dormant subroutine labeled 'PROPHECY_ENGINE'.
clue_002b.notes: Subroutine dates back to RAPPverse founding.

clue_002c.description: [HIDDEN] Original RAPPverse blueprints mention a 'Voice of the Founders' easter egg.

clue_002d.description: [HIDDEN] Signal analysis shows the whispers originate from coordinates outside known RAPPverse space.
clue_002d.notes: Another dimension is trying to communicate.

whisper_log.message: Seven will rise when three fall...
Seek the crystal where shadows converge...
